DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Collecting store sample blood study laboratory may help doctor learn change may occur DNA identify biomarkers related cancer . PURPOSE : This laboratory study examine biomarkers woman high risk average risk breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Identification Biomarkers Women High Risk Average Risk Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Identify validate serum biomarkers distinguish malignant benign normal breast condition woman high risk average risk breast cancer . Secondary - Standardize procedure recruitment , characterization , follow-up participant collection , processing , storage , analysis specimen . - Assess marker variability time healthy control . - Develop share specimen resource support ongoing early detection research . OUTLINE : Blood sample collect every 6 month assay presence biomarkers . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 625 participant accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Planning undergo outpatient annual mammogram biopsy AND meet 1 follow criterion : High risk breast cancer High risk newlydiagnosed* breast cancer Average risk breast cancer Average risk newlydiagnosed* breast cancer Benign breast disease NOTE : * Diagnosed time study enrollment No breast cancer diagnosis within past year Hormone receptor status : Not specify PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age 25 Sex Female Menopausal status Not specify Performance status Not specify Life expectancy Not specify Hematopoietic No hemophilia No bleeding disorder Hepatic Not specify Renal Not specify Other Not pregnant nursing At least 6 month postpartum No plan pregnancy within next year No history medical condition would increase participant risk blood draw No psychiatric , psychological , condition would preclude give informed consent PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy Not specify Chemotherapy Not specify Endocrine therapy Not specify Radiotherapy Not specify Surgery No prior double mastectomy Other No concurrent treatment breast cancer
